course.subject: SBMT
course.name: Investment and Finance In Asia and China
course.description: The course is designed to provide a practical understanding of executing investments and corporate transactions with a focus on Asia and China. Given the importance of China both in Asia and globally, it will spend time delving into select nuances of and regulations governing corporate transactions in China with regard to other jurisdictions. There will be several hands-on elements involving the construction of basic financial models and analyses throughout the course.
